vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new Specific Use Permit for a Commercial Amusement (Inside) with a dance hall on property zoned Planned Development District No. 784, the Trinity River Corridor Special Purpose District, on the southwest line of South Riverfront Boulevard, between I-30 and I-35
Recommendation of Staff:  Hold under advisement
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z212-252(MP)

Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z212-252(MP)
